    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AutoRefreshAgent
    Runnable agent that periodically triggers an inbox refresh.
    ButtonHandleSMTP
    ActionListener implementation for handling button events in the SMTP panel.
    ButtonHoverHandle
    Handles mouse hover effects for generic buttons in the SMTP module.
    ClientHandler
    Handler for individual client connections to the notification server.
    Common
    Common utility class containing shared constants, color themes, and helper methods.
    ConnecionFTP
     
    ConnecionSQL
    Utility class for establishing connections to the MySQL database.
    CrudController
    Controller class for the CRUD interface.
    CrudControllerTest
     
    CrudFrontend
    Frontend panel for CRUD operations, handling UI components and user interactions.
    CrudFrontend.AccionFilaListener
    Interface for handling row actions.
    CrudFrontendFake
     
    DeleteEmailTask
    Task for deleting an email from the server and updating the UI.
    DownloadEmailTask
    Task for downloading the full email content to a local file.
    EmailConfig
    Configuration class housing static properties for SMTP, IMAP, and POP3 connections.
    EmailModel
    Model class representing an email message.
    EmailSenderTask
    Task for sending an email in a separate thread.
    EmailTableMouseListener
    Mouse listener for the emails table.
    FieldFocusHandle
    Focus adapter to change the border color of form fields when they gain or lose focus.
    FTPbtnNewFolder
     
    FTPbtnReturn
     
    FTPbtnUp
     
    FTPbtnUpFile
     
    FTPButtonsEditor
     
    FTPButtonsPanel
     
    FTPButtonsRenderer
     
    FTPdoubleClick
     
    FTPFileOwnershipDAO
    DAO for managing FTP file ownership in database.
    FTPlist
     
    FTPTableModel
    Table model for displaying FTP files in a JTable.
    HandleSMTP
    Backend service for handling SMTP and IMAP operations.
    HandleSMTPTest
     
    Language
    Static wrapper for language translation services.
    LoadContentTask
    Task for loading the content of a specific email.
    LoadingDialog
    Loading dialog shown while connecting to FTP server.
    LoginAttempt
    Handles the login attempt logic for the application.
    LoginButton
    Handles mouse interactions for generic buttons on the login screen, providing hover effects.
    LoginEnterKeyListener
    Key listener that triggers the login button action when the Enter key is pressed.
    LoginPlaceholderPasswordFieldHandler
    Handles focus events for JPasswordField to implement placeholder behavior and styling.
    LoginPlaceholderTextFieldHandler
    Handles focus events for JTextField to implement placeholder behavior and styling.
    Main
     
    MenuMouseListener
    Listener for handling mouse events on menu buttons, providing visual feedback.
    MenuSelect
    Controller class for handling the main menu tabbing and panel switching.
    MessageListenerThread
    Thread responsible for listening to messages from the notification server.
    MouseClickListener
    Extended mouse listener for the emails table.
    NotificationClient
    Notification client that connects to the NotificationServer and receives FTP change notifications.
    NotificationClient.MessageListener
    Interface for handling received messages
    NotificationController
    Controller that coordinates FTP notifications between clients and manages table updates.
    NotificationServer
    Notification server that manages client connections and broadcasts FTP change notifications.
    PanelCrud
    Panel for CRUD operations.
    PanelFTP
    Panel for FTP file management.
    PanelLogin
    Panel for the login screen.
    PanelMenu
    Main menu panel housing the application tabs.
    PanelSMTP
    Panel for SMTP email management.
    PasswordMigrationTool
    Utility program to migrate existing plain text passwords to BCrypt hashes.
    PasswordUtil
    Utility class for password hashing and verification using BCrypt algorithm.
    RefreshInboxTask
    Task for refreshing the email inbox.
    Rol
    Model class representing a user role and its permissions.
    ServerListenerThread
    Thread responsible for listening to incoming client connections on the notification server.
    ServiceFTP
     
    ServiceFTPTest
     
    ServiceLogin
    Service class for handling user authentication and data retrieval.
    ServiceLoginTest
     
    ServiceSMTP
    Service class for SMTP-related database checks, such as whitelist and user verification.
    ServiceSMTPTest
     
    ThemeToggleListener
    Listener for toggling the application's theme (light/dark mode).
    ToggleReadStatusTask
    Task for toggling the read/unread status of an email on the server.
    TranslateService
    Service class for handling application localization and translations.
    Usuario
    Model class representing a user application.
    Whitelist
    Model class for whitelisted email addresses.
